entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -33.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -37.7°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
